PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_BuildingWaterStorage
PropertySetDef.Definition: The basic set of properties that are used for determining the water requirements for a building. Typically, this property set is expected to be used in conjunction with IfcBuilding.

PropertyDef.Name: WaterStorageRatePerPerson
PropertyDef.Definition: The volume of domestic water that needs to be stored per person.

PropertyDef.Name: OneDayPotableWater
PropertyDef.Definition: The volume of water that needs to be stored to supply water to the building for human use for one day in the event of water supply failure.

PropertyDef.Name: OneDayEssentialWater
PropertyDef.Definition: The volume of water that needs to be stored to supply water to the building for uninterrupted water supply to essential areas for one day in the event of water supply failure. An essential area is considered to be a part of a building carrying out a critical function and that is unable to operate in the intended manner without a water supply.

PropertyDef.Name: OneDayCoolingTowerMakeupWater
PropertyDef.Definition: The volume of water that needs to be stored to supply make up water to the cooling towers in a building for one day in the event of water supply failure.

PropertyDef.Name: OneDayProcessOrProductionWater
PropertyDef.Definition: The volume of water that needs to be stored to supply water for process or production requirements in a building for one day in the event of water supply failure.
